## GenerateResponse class

GenerateResponse is the result from a `generate()` call and contains one or more generated candidate messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class GenerateResponse<O = unknown> implements GenerateResponseData 
```
**Implements:** GenerateResponseData

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[data(index)](./ai.generateresponse.data.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns the first detected `data` part of the selected candidate's message.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[media(index)](./ai.generateresponse.media.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns the first detected media part in the selected candidate's message. Useful for extracting (for example) an image from a generation expected to create one.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[output(index)](./ai.generateresponse.output.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

If the selected candidate's message contains a `data` part, it is returned. Otherwise, the `output()` method extracts the first valid JSON object or array from the text contained in the selected candidate's message and returns it.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[text(index)](./ai.generateresponse.text.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Concatenates all `text` parts present in the candidate's message with no delimiter.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[toHistory(index)](./ai.generateresponse.tohistory.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Appends the message generated by the selected candidate to the messages already present in the generation request. The result of this method can be safely serialized to JSON for persistence in a database.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[toJSON()](./ai.generateresponse.tojson.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
